a graphical servicesystem with variable syntaxman-machine interaction in many fields of endeavorshould be greatly facilitated in the near future through the use of interactive graphical languages to provide a variety of display scope communication procedures a graphic service system which functionsas a generalized graphical language translator is being developed to aid the definition aswell as the use of new graphical languages.cacm march 1966roberts l g.ca660305 jb march 3 1978 1:49 pm1467 5 14671467 5 14671467 5 14671767 5 14671781 5 1467123 6 1467196 6 1467196 6 1467919 6 1467990 6 14671007 6 14671046 6 14671131 6 14671139 6 14671140 6 14671149 6 14671198 6 14671215 6 14671223 6 14671265 6 14671303 6 14671323 6 14671358 6 14671366 6 14671421 6 14671460 6 14671462 6 14671463 6 14671467 6 14671467 6 14671468 6 14671468 6 14671477 6 14671491 6 14671496 6 14671496 6 14671531 6 14671535 6 14671565 6 14671601 6 14671602 6 14671613 6 14671614 6 14671626 6 14671641 6 14671787 6 14671788 6 1467205 6 1467224 6 1467249 6 1467288 6 1467316 6 1467381 6 1467398 6 146711 6 1467404 6 1467410 6 1467463 6 1467464 6 1467483 6 14673184 6 14673188 6 1467584 6 1467600 6 1467680 6 1467691 6 1467763 6 1467799 6 1467
